metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14198 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Das U-Boot through 2019.07. There is an unbounded memcpy with a failed length check at nfs_read_reply when calling store_block in the NFSv3 case.

criterions.comment: u-boot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
